订阅主题
func:
let topics = [
    "0x00158d0003539f17",
    "0x00158d000353c53f",
    "ESP8266x00c03831",
    "ESP8266x00c17ca1",
    "ESP8266x00068a16",
    "ESP8266x0098b1f8",
    "ESP8266x00c22bf6",
    "ESP8266x00c20638",
    "ESP8266x00c1cd77",
    "ESP8266x00c1a22a",
    "ESP8266x003d92de",
    "ESP8266x00c1ad5e",
    "ESP8266x00c1cbb8"
    ]


node.send({
        action: "unsubscribe",
        topic: topics
})

node.send({
        action: "subscribe",
        topic: topics
})
